article: Mr Klip is a millionaire . He  _  delicious food. He had a good  _  , Mr Black. The man could cook all kinds of food. Mrs Klip asked him  to teach  her last month. She learned a lot  _  him. Then she thought she was good at  _  and didn't want Mr Black to work for them  any longer  . Now Mrs Klip begins to cook for her  _  . But Mr Klip doesn't like the food at all. He says he won't  _  any food at home  _  she doesn't stop cooking. Mrs Klip  _  she will find another cook for her husband. This morning Mr Klip had nothing to do,  _  he went shopping. Suddenly he broke a window of the shop . The shop assistant  _  the policeman and the policeman took him to the  police station  . The policeman said, " I'm sorry to tell you, Mr Klip , I will fine you ten dollars ,or you'll stay in prison .  _  do you want ?" "I'll stay in prison", said the millionaire. "Why ?" "Because my wife will find a new cook  _  ten days .
